decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - This proposal CONSTITUTES DEVELOPMENT within the meaning of Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, and a planning application IS REQUIRED. 

The proposed single storey rear extension would extend beyond the rear wall of the original dwelling house by more than 3 metres. This would be contrary to the requirements set out in Class A, A.1 (f) (i) of the General Permitted Development Order (GPDO) 2015 (as amended).

Reason : 2 - This proposal CONSTITUTES DEVELOPMENT within the meaning of Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, and a planning application IS REQUIRED. 

The proposed eaves height of the single storey rear extension would exceed 3metres. This would be contrary to the requirements set out in Class A, A.1(i) of the General Permitted Development Order (GPDO) 2015 (as amended).

Reason : 3 - This proposal CONSTITUTES DEVELOPMENT within the meaning of Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, and a planning application IS REQUIRED. 

The proposal includes a raised paito with a height of 400mm. This would be contrary to the requirements set out in Class A, A.1(k) of the General Permitted Development Order (GPDO) 2015 (as amended).

Reason : 3 - This proposal CONSTITUTES DEVELOPMENT within the meaning of Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, and a planning application IS REQUIRED. 

The proposal includes a raised paito with a height of 400mm. This would be contrary to the requirements set out in Class A, A.1(k) of the General Permitted Development Order (GPDO) 2015 (as amended).
description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION
